content: तार {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [तॄ-णिच् भावे अच्] {@--1@} High, (as a note.) {@--2@} Loud, shrill (as a sound); <ls>Māl. 5. 20.</ls> {@--3@} Shining, radiant, clear; हारांस्तारांस्तरलगुटिकान् (regarded as an interpolation in <ls>Me.</ls> by <ls>Malli.</ls>); उरसि निहितस्तारो हारः <ls>Amaru. 28</ls>; <ls>R. 5. 52.</ls> {@--4@} Good, excellent, well-flavoured. {@--5@} Clear, clean. --रः {@--1@} The bank of a river. {@--2@} The clearness of a pearl. {@--3@} A beautiful or big pearl; हारममलतरतारमुरसि दधतं <ls>Gīt. 11.</ls> {@--4@} An epithet of (1) Viṣṇu, (2) Śiva. {@--5@} The mystical syllable ओम् (प्रणव). {@--6@} Protection. {@--7@} A high tone or note. {@--8@} Crossing, passing over. --रः, --रं {@--1@} A star or planet; (said to be {%<ab>f.</ab>%} also). {@--2@} The pupil of the eye; (said to be {%<ab>m.</ab>%} also). {@--3@} A pearl (said to be {%<ab>f.</ab>%} also).
